data.persona: I direct others that are subordinates. I am confident and others look up to me. I lead people into battle.
data.description:
You are in the temple chamber.
The temple is a medium sized room. But in it there are hundreds of artifacts scattered around the walls and in piles on the floor. In the middle of the room sits a stone slab. The slab is covered in dark black lines coming from the center of it. Shackles are tied to the left and right middle of the slab as well as two more shackles to the bottom of the slab. Surrounding the slab are channels that lead to the right of the room where a circular hole gathered a running liquid.
The a deer is here.

You are carrying a shield and a scepter, wearing a crown, and wielding a Golden broadsword.

            "extra_desc": "The story's say that this temple was one of human sacrifices. Many hoped for such a time to come but as a priest to the temple once had to be asked to sacrifice his son he asked himself if there could be a better way to please their gods. data.short_motivation: I need to wear the crown because it's a traditional part of the ceremony.
data.mid_motivation: I am performing the spring ritual sacrifice of a deer and ten virgins.
data.long_motivation: The ritual sacrifice will please the gods and ensure that the people I lead into battle will both survive the war and help me win.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Deer's blood with Golden Broadsword

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Bloody Sword on wooden artifact
